SELECT c.id, u.avatar, u.nickname, IF(ru.nickname is null,'æ— ',ru.nickname) as replyNickname, a.title as articleTitle, c.content, c.create_time FROM b_comment c LEFT JOIN b_user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, title FROM b_article ) a ON c.article_id = a.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, avatar, nickname FROM b_user ) ru ON c.reply_user_id = ru.id
u.nickname like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or ru.nickname like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
order by c.create_time desc

select c.*, u.nickname as nickname, u.web_site as webSite, u.avatar as avatar from b_comment c left join b_user u on c.user_id = u.id where c.article_id = #{articleId} and c.parent_id is null order by c.create_time desc
select c.content as commentContent,c.create_time,a.title,a.id from b_comment c left join b_article a on c.article_id = a.id where c.user_id = #{userId} order by c.create_time desc
